analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The pricing and blog pages have the best performance, with load times under 300ms.
The homepage has a longer load time, mainly due to a higher FCP, indicating that there might be room for optimization in rendering the initial view of the page.

The "How It Works" page failed the test, suggesting potential issues such as unoptimized resources, slow server response time, or inefficient code. A thorough investigation is required to identify and resolve these issues.
